title: Fisher Price Little People: Christmastime Is Here!
description: Lots of sturdy flaps and a perfect holiday theme are freshly presented in the new release of a refreshed—and best-selling—Fisher-Price Little People Christmastime Is Here! (nearly half a million copies sold). The cover’s been redesigned to call out the attractive offerings in this book featuring lots on every page to engage children and embraces all of the fun aspects of the Season (Santa, sledding, caroling, and more). Fun flaps on every page, and familiar Little People characters (Eddie, Sonya Lee and their friends) make this a must have under every toddler’s tree.
author: Ellen Weiss
